text: Naser Malek Motiei (Persian: ناصر ملک‌مطیعی) (29 March 1930 – 25 May 2018) was an Iranian actor. He was born in Tehran. He starred in movies and television shows from 1949 to 1982 and again in 2014. He was known for his roles in Wood Pigeon (1970), Mehdi in Black and Hot Mini Pants (1972), and in And Then There Were None (1974). Motiei died in Tehran of renal failure on 25 May 2018 at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Movie actors Category:Television actors Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Naser Malek Motiei
